p.em: Preston School District believes that in partnership with parents and the community our schools will provide appropriate opportunities for all learners to reach their academic and social potential in a safe and supportive environment.

span.p: Preston School District will begin delivering home based learning to students on Monday, March 30th! Click here for more information.

a.title: Click to read more about: Home Based Learning Begins Monday!

div.span: Home Based Learning Information! Click Here!

div.p: Preston School District is incorporating a personalized learning program where you can take core classes in a mastery based environment, work at a flexible pace, work closely with teachers to plan your individual path, and be able to move forward at the speed of your own mastery. For the 2019-2020 School Year we will be allowing Freshman, Sophomores, and Juniors to take part. Follow this link for more info.
